channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Aussie crypto exchange kicks off US expansion despite ‘regulatory risk’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: “Where other exchanges see regulatory risk, we see opportunity,” said Coinjar CEO and co-founder Asher Tan in a recent interview.

item.title: ‘Godfather of AI’ resigns from Google, warns of the dangers of AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Dr. Geoffrey Hinton is understood to have worked on artificial intelligence his whole life and is now warning how dangerous the technology could be.

item.title: Sotheby’s auction house launches on-chain secondary NFT marketplace
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The luxury auction house has developed a fully on-chain sales system where users can purchase curated NFTs on the Ethereum and Polygon networks.

item.title: MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin conviction ‘strong’ as it posts Q1 profit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: A one-time income tax benefit helped the firm reach a profit of $94 million in the first quarter of 2023.

item.title: Level Finance confirms $1M exploit due to buggy smart contract
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: An attacker manipulated a “claim multiple” bug in a Level Finance smart contract to steal more than 214,000 LVL tokens from the exchange.

item.title: Bitcoin hash rates threaten blockchain decentralization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alexa Karp
item.description: The blockchain industry is facing a massive power imbalance — just like the traditional finance industry.

item.title: Industry heavyweights respond to UK’s crypto asset regulatory framework proposal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: HM Treasury was directed to spot problems that may need refinement, but the basic principles of its approach were heartily welcomed.

item.title: Liquid staking solutions now have more TVL than DEXs: DefiLlama
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: From April 13 to May 1, TVL on decentralized exchanges declined by $1.66 billion while it increased on liquid staking protocols by $280 million.

item.title: Scientists in Texas developed a GPT-like AI system that reads minds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: A new study demonstrates how the tech underlining ChatGPT can decode brain scans; recent AI progress indicates this could have implications for blockchain and Web3.

item.title: European Union pushes forward with first AI framework: Law Decoded, April 24–May 1
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: High-risk tools will not be banned entirely, though they will be subjected to stricter transparency procedures.

item.title: Poloniex will pay $7.6M settlement to US authorities for 'apparent violations' of sanctions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: OFAC said Poloniex allowed users in Crimea, Cuba, Iran, Sudan and Syria to conduct digital asset trades, deposits and withdrawals between January 2014 and November 2019.

item.title: Blur introduces NFT perpetual lending protocol
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Borrowing positions automatically roll their expiry and can be refinanced should one party unilaterally decide to terminate.

item.title: On the shutdown of Bittrex in the US and SEC actions — Bittrex Global CEO at Consensus 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Oliver Linch suggested jurisdictions with established frameworks for crypto and policymakers willing and able to use them were a potential winning combination for fledgling firms.

item.title: Justin Sun issues apology after Sui LaunchPool clashes with Binance CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Nearly $4 billion has been staked in Binance’s Sui farming pools in anticipation of the layer -1 blockchain’s airdrop.

item.title: Bitcoin price threatens $28K support as pre-FOMC mood boosts US dollar
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls fail to get a grip despite worries over U.S. banking sector stability, with BTC price near four-day lows.

item.title: Price analysis 5/1: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, MATIC, DOGE, SOL
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are witnessing aggressive selling at higher levels, indicating that the bears are trying to make a comeback.

item.title: Will $28K Bitcoin price hold? Two indicators remain solid despite 5% pullback
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC margin markets and futures’ long-to-short indicator show professional traders are unwilling to bet on Bitcoin's price dropping.

item.title: More crypto exchanges list PEPE following trading frenzy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The price of the memecoin has surged by over 2,000% in the past two weeks.

item.title: More TPS, less gas: Ethereum L2 Starknet outlines performance upgrades
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Starknet makes performance improvements a top priority in 2023, aiming to increase throughput, lower latency and reduce transaction costs.

item.title: What the Gensler hearing means for US crypto regulation and policy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Gensler was reluctant to go into details and faced symbolical pressure rather than genuine attempts to interrogate, leaving the crypto industry without any new clarity.

item.title: Meta SEC filing reveals debt securities offering plans
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Facebook parent company filed a prospectus that says it may offer and sell debt securities occasionally.

item.title: AI Eye: ‘Biggest ever’ leap in AI, cool new tools, AIs are real DAOs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: Does AI technology spell doom for Hollywood? Joe Lubin on AI, Wes Anderson’s Star Wars, and AI tasked with destroying humanity goes dark.

item.title: FTX investor Temasek pours $10M into algorithmic currency system Array
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The new algorithmic currency system aims to provide a more “stable, efficient and scalable” asset than common coins like Bitcoin.

item.title: AI meets blockchain: Revolutionizing smart contracts and cryptocurrency
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brad Spannbauer
item.description: The confluence of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology is paving the way for more intelligent, secure and streamlined smart contract ecosystems.

item.title: Bhutan has been mining Bitcoin with hydropower since BTC price was $5,000
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Bhutan uses Himalayan rivers to generate energy used to mine Bitcoin, local reports reveal.

item.title: Web3’s impact on personalization, trust and engagement through time-honored strategies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Charlie Silver
item.description: By harnessing the power of Web3 and one-to-one marketing, businesses can drive customer loyalty, enhance brand reputation and ultimately achieve long-term success in the decentralized digital world.

item.title: 5 free artificial intelligence courses and certifications
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Discover five free AI courses and certifications to help you expand your knowledge of artificial intelligence and machine learning.

item.title: Tokens but not crypto: Nigeria SEC prepares new digital asset rules
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Nigeria’s securities regulator will take at least 10 months to determine whether to register a digital asset-related company.

item.title: AI chatbot usage causes concern among 70% of Japanese adults
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A local Japanese news outlet survey revealed that 69.4% of adults want stricter regulations for AI development and implementation.

item.title: Liechtenstein adapts blockchain laws to developing crypto landscape
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Veronika Rinecker
item.description: Future regulation is intended to ensure uniform regulation for all European countries and covered participants.
